document_data.name: Faltis
document_data.mainbody: '''Faltis''' was a merchant of [[Beregost]] who lived in the town during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Template:Cite game/Baldur's Gate}}
document_data.Relationships: He was an associate of two other merchants, [[Glayde]] and [[Tessilan]].
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1368}}, Faltis, Glayde, and Tessilan were targeted by the scam artist [[Silke Rosena]]. The young bard arranged to meet the merchants at the [[Red Sheaf]] inn under the guise of purchasing a collection of gems. Silke then told the [[bard]] [[Garrick]] and some passers by the men were local thugs hired by [[Feldepost]] to collect gold after failing to perform at [[Feldepost's Inn|his inn]], in an attempt to have them attacked so she could make away with the gems.
